resources.string: Prikaži ali spremeni kako se bo prikazal pripomoček \'cLock\'
Prikaži in prilagodi trenutne ravni omrežnega prometa
Skrij nadzornik prometa, ko ni aktivnosti
Čas, po katerem je hitrost ponovno izmerjena
Imerzivne nedavne so povožene, če je vklopljeno razširjeno namizje.
Hiše apps from appearing on recents screen
These apps will be automatically hide from recents screen when they are opened next time
Uporabi OmniSwitch namesto privzetega pogleda nedavnih aplikacij
Prepričaj se, da si omogočil OmniSwitch tako, da odpreš OmniSwitch nastavitve.
Spremeni bližnjice pod uro na zaklenjenem zaslonu
Onemogoči\nDodaj vnos, da omogočiš to funkcijo
Izbrana aplikacija ni vrnila veljavne ikone ali pa ne podpira obrezovanje slik. Uporabi drugo aplikacijo.
Izbranega dejanja ni mogoče dodati dvakrat
, medtem, ko bo izbiranje ikon podalo možnosti prilagajanja

Za dodajanje %1$s, izberi Dodaj ikono. Ko je %1$s dodan, bo izbira vrstice spremenila tarčo%2$s

Za odstranitev %1$s, potegnite vrstico vodoravno levo ali desno. Preuredi %1$s v seznamu tako, da navpično potegneš sidro na levi.

Za počistiti ali ponastaviti na privzeto, izberi ikono Ponastavi.
Odstranitev vseh %1$s na seznamu bo onemogočilo funkcijo v celoti.
Odstranitev vseh %1$s na seznamu bo onemogočilo drugo plast pite v celoti.

Nastavitve, ki temeljijo na senzorjih so odvisne od kompatibilnosti strojne opreme. Omogočenje senzorjev za ambientalni zaslon lahko poveča porabo energije.

Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off

To clear all apps, pinch-in with two fingers on the panel. To block an app from being cleared, long press on its icon to star it.\n\nFor additional recents features such as multiwindow or to kill an app, long press or drag an app card in the panel.

Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often

- Swipe up on left or right side

- Swipe up center

- Short swipe up and hold in the center

Active volume stream will be displayed on the screen even if disabled here. Volume streams enabled here would be displayed forcefully.
This will reset battery history stats. Would you like to continue?
Display clock in quick status bar header

This mode disables the back button and you can trigger a back button action by a left swipe on navbar. Right swipe still triggers the last-app and the overview apps scrolling. To go home you can tap on any navbar empty space, not only the home button. When keyboard is showing, long press on navbar to move the text cursor.
Tap on an empty navbar space but not the home button to switch the screen off.

Press the Wi\u2011Fi Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \u201cWPS\u201d or marked with this symbol:

WPS succeeded. Connecting to the network\u2026
WPS is already in progress and can take up to two minutes to complete
WPS failed. Please try again in a few minutes.
The wireless router security setting (WEP) is not supported
The wireless router security setting (TKIP) is not supported
Another WPS session was detected. Please try again in a few minutes.

These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.

Sets the ambient light animation duration

Reset battery statistics after reaching user defined charging level

Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery. When enabled, battery stops charging at Stop trigger level and resumes charging at Start trigger level. Stop trigger level should be always greater than Start trigger level.
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
